title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama core repo: download and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command; includes Go CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that plugs into local Ollama; supports multi-model chats, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experiment to run a local GitHub Copilot-like code-completion service powered by CodeLlama via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit to chat over your documents offline.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama; Kotlin-friendly, Spring Boot starters, synchronous & reactive APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset – use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI micro-service, Discord bot, Obsidian plugin, Home-Assistant agent, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and model auto-pull support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama; statically linked binaries, async HTTP, and Nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; supports streaming chat, model management, and Rails integration.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model; slash commands, thread support, rate-limit.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for integration tests against LLM calls without cloud keys.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds “Ask Ollama” command palette and sidebar chat using your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate with strongly-typed models, Tokio streaming, and examples for Axum & Tauri apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes, generate summaries, and autocomplete via Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and Docker compose to run alongside Ollama.
